content.raw:
@peter_mitrano , do you mind breaking this pull request into smaller ones? I think it would make it faster to review and get them merged.

About plugins, I feel like the models which we provide in `gazebo_models` should work fully with gazebo out-of-the-box. So I'm not sure what's the best solution here. To distribute these models in a separate repository? I'm not sure shipping all the plugins with Gazebo is a good idea either... Maybe someone else has a better idea.

About plugins, I feel like the models which we provide in gazebo_models should work fully with gazebo out-of-the-box. So I'm not sure what's the best solution here. To distribute these models in a separate repository? I'm not sure shipping all the plugins with Gazebo is a good idea either... Maybe someone else has a better idea.
